Name: Jonathan Demme
Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Name: Judd Apatow
Bio: Judd Apatow is an American producer, writer, director, actor and stand-up comedian.

Name: Hayao Miyazaki
Bio: Hayao Miyazaki is one of Japan's greatest animation directors.

Name: Bong Joon Ho
Bio: Bong Joon Ho is a  korean writer and producer.

Name: Sergio Pablos
Bio: Sergio Pablos' career in animation spans over three decades,he has worked as a character designer, story-board artist, and most recently as writer and Director.

Name: Tim Burton
Bio: Timothy Walter Burton is an American film director, producer, writer and artist.

Name: Cary Joji Fukunago
Bio: Cary Joji Fukunaga is a producer and director.

Name: Barry Sonnenfeld
Bio: Barry Sonnenfeld was born and raised in New York City. He graduated from New York University Film School in 1978.

Name: Gary Ross
Bio: Gary Ross is an American writer, director and actor.

Name: Nicolas Roeg
Bio: Nicolas Jack Roeg CBE BSC was an English film director and cinematographer.
